title: All 4 Moscow Airports Shut Down, At Least 11 Ukrainian Drones Destroyed
desc: All four international airports of the Russian capital were closed due to safety concerns on Sunday afternoon until further notice as air defence forces shot down 11 Ukrainian drones within an hour.

title: Unerring Elliot leads Antrim to first win of the season
desc: Antrim had a big victory in Belfast on Sunday afternoon after they gave Carlow a thumping at Corrigan Park for their first win of the season.

title: Chanel Auction at Bonhams Nets 609,574 Euros, Outstripping Estimates
desc: The top lot at the Bonhams Cornette de Saint Cyr sale was a jacket by Karl Lagerfeld for the 2005 Cruise collection, which outstripped expectations.

title: Africa’s New Travel Titan: Zimbabwe Joins Top Destiantions for 2026 Tourism Boom
desc: Discover why Zimbabwe is joining Tanzania, Kenya, and Mauritius as a leading African travel destination in 2026.

title: Rehoboth intensifying fight against drug abuse amid community outcry

title: Stars, Filmmakers Dance Night Away At Chanel Party
desc: Wagner Moura, Jesse Plemons, Wunmi Mosaku, Regé-Jean Page, Ryan Coogler and Marisa Abela were among stars at the Chanel and Charles Finch party.

title: Specialised courts, afternoon sittings to tackle case delays
desc: Judicial Secretary, Musah Ahmed, says the judiciary has put in place a comprehensive system designed to tackle the long-standing problem of case delays — one that combines the newly established Specialised High Court Division with afternoon courts to significantly reduce the workload on individual judges. Ahmed made the remarks on The Law on Joy News, providing the most detailed explanation yet of how the reforms introduced by Chief Justice Paul Baffoe-Bonnie will work in practice.

title: Arsenal's Olivia Smith taken off on stretcher in FA Cup win over Bristol City
desc: Arsenal forward Olivia Smith is taken off on a stretcher during the Gunners' 3-0 victory over Bristol City in the Women's FA Cup.
